name: logitech-litra
title: Logitech Litra
description: Manage USB-connected Logitech Litra Glow, Litra Beam and Litra Beam LX lights from Raycast
author: timrogers

commands.name: manage-devices
commands.title: Manage Devices
commands.subtitle: Turn on and off, and set brightness and temperature
commands.description: Turn your USB-connected Logitech Litra devices on or off, and set their brightness and temperature

commands.name: manage-temperature-presets
commands.title: Manage Temperature Presets
commands.subtitle: Set up presets for your Litra devices' temperature
commands.description: Configure presets so you can manage your Litra devices' temperature from Raycast

commands.name: manage-brightness-presets
commands.title: Manage Brightness Presets
commands.subtitle: Set up presets for your Litra devices' brightness
commands.description: Configure presets so you can manage your Litra devices' brightness from Raycast

preferences.name: litraBinaryPath
preferences.title: `litra` binary path
preferences.description: The path to the `litra` binary. You can install the `litra` command line tool by following the instructions at https://github.com/timrogers/litra-rs, and then running `which litra` to get the path.
